text: amado geudaeege gyesidoen geosgaunde ilbuleul ppatteulilkka yeomlyeodoenila wae geudaeege bomul-i naelyeooji anihaess-eumyeo wae geudaewa hamkke cheonsa ga ileuji anhneunyo lago geudeul-i malhaneun geos-eulo geudaeui ma-eum-i sangcheo leul bad-eulkka yeomlyeodoem-ila geuleona geu daeneun gyeong-goja-e bulgwahamyeo hananim-imodeun geos-eul jugwanhasinila
